lore: An unassuming bodyguard, the Locus may be overlooked by the foe until the exact moment it abandons calm stillness for lightning-fast attack. Robes thrown back, the Locusâ€™ whipping tail barb and vestigial limbs are revealed even as its twin blades flash out to neutralise any threats to its ward.
